We can't have them ready to turn against us too

DINOBOT nodded, "As you say.  If there is a third assemblage=
 of forces on this planet, with as extensive an army and a system as to set=
 up this jamming zone, this underground facility, and also tracking us clos=
ely enough to capture our leaders, then for now they are a greater priority=
."

Pausing then a moment, "If the rodent remains with us, was he not a min=
er originally?  Perhpas he mgiht aid then in our explorations and digging."=
  For had not his memory files given a vague recollection of Rattrap once s=
tating he was the greatest miner in the Vega Cluster?
